title: Kataomoi - Unrequited Love
author: Kuroe Nara
description: "I told them I loved them. The sky didn’t fall—but something inside me did." — Since that day, the world hasn’t felt quite real. Clocks tick louder, shadows linger longer, and laughter comes at the strangest times — as if the universe, too, doesn’t know what to do with a broken heart.
